page.title: 17DAIRY FARMING
page.content: Norwood Farm is run by Mr. Smith. The farm consists of 130 acres of grazing land. There are 100 cows with a few calves and yearlings. The machinery on the farm is: 4 Tractors,2 Bailers,2 Muck spreaders, 1 Disc Harrow,1 Roller,1 Plough and 1 Drill. ______________________________________ Manor Farm,Willey is run by Mr. Sharpe. The farm consists of 60 acres of grazing land.The farm house is 300yrs old.There are 47 cows with some followers,calves and yearlings. The machinery on the farm is: 2 Tractors 1 Forage Feeder for silage 1 Yard Scraper 1 Fertilizer spinner
